Text: Connie SuttonHOUECT is out of the officewill be out of the office from until I will respond to your message when I return If something is URGENT please email Linda Bryan or page her at

May Assignment Termination Expiration Reportis the Global Contracts Assignment Termination and Exploration Report for May This report is very long this month due to cleanup of CES data If you have any questions please call me at or email me Also if you do not wish to receive this report any longer please inform me and I will remove your name from the list Thanks
Connie SuttonHOUECT is out of the officewill be out of the office from until Please contact email or page Linda Bryan at

Out of OfficeContracts and Global Facilities personnel will be attending an offsite conference on June th and th If you need something while we are away please do not hesitate to use the Team pagers listed below or call me at We will have a laptop available to setup contracts if needed If you page us we will return your page as quickly as possible Thanks
June ATE Reportis the June ATE Report for ENA If you no longer wish to be on this distribution list please let me know and we will remove you from it Thanks

Looking for some LNG Contractshave delivered a copy of LNG contracts to Scott Earnests office tonight One is between Abu Dhabi Gas Liquefaction Company Limited Dabhol Power Company and the other is between Dabhol Power Company and Oman LNG LLC I understand the EGEP Legal group Steve Watson is currently working on a third contract but it is not executed at this time He has advised that he will forward a copy when it is completed Forwarded by Connie SuttonHOUECT on PM Connie Sutton PM To Sally CT Scott CT Mary CT cc Subject Looking for some LNG Contracts I will let you know when I hear something regarding these type of contracts Forwarded by Connie SuttonHOUECT on PM Bridgette Anderson ENRON PM To Connie CT cc Subject Looking for some LNG Contracts Forwarded by Bridgette AndersonCorpEnron on PM Rob Walls ENRONDEVELOPMENT PM To Sandeep Katwala Bridgette NRON Wade ClineENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Looking for some LNG Contracts Bridgette By copy of this message I have asked Sandeep Katwala acting general counsel for Enron India to help locate these contracts for you Let me know if you need anything else Thanks Forwarded by Rob WallsENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM Bridgette Anderson ENRON PM To Wade ClineENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Rob WallsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Looking for some LNG Contracts Gentlemen I was told that both of you worked on the Dabhol project so I am hoping that you can assist me As the message below states I am trying to find contracts that are related to this project Please see below for details If it was a mistake to send this message to you please forward to the correct individual Thank you Bridgette Forwarded by Bridgette AndersonCorpEnron on PM Connie CT PM To Bridgette NRON cc Subject Looking for some LNG Contracts Can you try to locate a copy of this contract for me Forwarded by Connie SuttonHOUECT on PM Mary Solmonson PM To Connie CT cc Subject Looking for some LNG Contracts Sally and Scott Earnest called this afternoon We will be setting up a new risk book to manage LNG positions on a worldwide basis Supposedly there are several contracts from the old EI entity related to India for LNG They may reference Dabhol Power project fuel management fuel oil heating oil Scott desperately needs to get copies of these contracts Can you ask around with some of the contacts you made on your India trip to see if you can find these and get copies

List of Primary and Backup Book Administrators Cc not received the information requested below from either yourself or your Book Admins Please supply it to me no later than close of business Wednesday November If you have any questions regarding the spreadsheet please do not hesitate to call or email me Thanks Forwarded by Connie SuttonHOUECT on AM Connie Sutton AM To Jeffrey C CT Stacey W CT Mary CT Kori CT John CT Clara CT Timothy M CT Eric CT Mark CT Martha CT Sarah nron Allan FordENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Jeremy NRON Monica ES Gallin ES David CT Steve CT cc Shona nron Chris CT Debbie R CT Matt A CT David CT Joel nron Stephen CT Subject List of Primary and Backup Book Administrators As part of the Risk Task Force I am requesting for you to have your book administrators fill out the attached spreadsheet in order to have a complete listing of all Book Administrators and what books each is responsible for officializing I have included an example sheet in the workbook but if they have any questions please have them call me at I would like to get this information returned electronically by close of business Friday November Thank you
